short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dive into the dark, epic world of Berserk Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring the legendary protagonist Guts from Berserk, this extension brings the intensity of the series to your new tab. Quickly access your favorite websites with popular shortcuts, add custom links, and stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock. Search the web effortlessly using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Experience the powerful world of Berserk with Guts.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Access your most visited websites quickly.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your tab with the links you use most.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay on schedule with the integrated calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Effortlessly search the web with your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall easily via the provided links.
